title: Liverpool's Roberto Firmino works out with Larissa Pereira | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Roberto Firmino has become the fulcrum of Liverpool relentlessly-attacking team under Jurgen Klopp . And the all-action Brazilian has used his side's extended break to hit the gym with his wife Larissa Pereira. Liverpool took a mid-season trip to La Manga last week after a nightmare start to 2017 which saw them slip out of the top four and crash out of both domestic cups. Roberto Firmino and Larissa Pereira hit the gym ahead of Liverpool's clash with Leicester Pereira, who met the Liverpool star in a nightclub in 2013, recently gave birth to a daughter And the forward has ensured the rest of his side's two-week break has not been wasted, by working out alongside Periera ahead of Liverpool's visit to Leicester this coming monday. Firmino and his wife met in a nightclub in 2013 and the couple recently gave birth to their second child. The Liverpool forward recently posted photos of the pair heading out for Valentine's Day, as well as snaps of him and several Liverpool team-mates at a Wesley Safadao concert . Firmino has scored nine goals and registered six assists for Liverpool this season Firmino recently posted a photo on his Instagram of the couple on Valentine's Day Their night out came in the wake of Liverpool's 2-0 win over Tottenham this month, which was their first league victory of 2017. The win means Jurgen Klopp's side travel to Leicester on Monday one point off the top four, but only point clear of rivals Manchester United in sixth. The Merseyside club confirmed on Wednesday that they will leave their historic training ground at Melwood and redevelop their academy in Kirkby to cater both youth and first team set ups.
